attributes.action: You The People Show The Establishment. We the people want a General Election.
attributes.additional_details: So take a stand and show the establishment we the people are totally disgusted how Brexit has been handled. Leave or Remain come together and show the establishment. God bless to you the people in the real world. Working hard, paying your taxes. Ask your self does the establishment worry about you the people? You know the answer so sign my petition and I will take it to our establishment for you the people God bless.
attributes.background:
LEAVE OR REMAIN COME TOGETHER 

The world has been watching the United Kingdom over Brexit. You have totally lost support from the people who pay your wages. Brexit has embarrassed the whole Country. If you voted to Leave or Reamain that was your choice and your own reason.
